attributes.name: Levi's® 501® Straight Fit Jeans
attributes.description: A cultural icon worn by generations, defining style for decades. The iconic straight fit with the signature button fly. Since Levi's® invented it in 1873, people have made them their own by ripping, tearing, repairing, dying and marking them up for total

attributes.name: Chuck 70 Raw Edge
attributes.description: The timeless style you know and love gets remixed with light padding and unexpected raw-edge details. An elevated style icon, it features more cushioning to keep you looking ”and feeling” good all day. The Chuck 70 holds its own on fashion week runways and city streets, making it the go-to sneaker for those looking to enhance and express their style.
details: High-top sneaker, crafted with organic canvas for an elevated look and feel
Raw-cut textile inserts for added padding
Shiny rubber sidewall and winged tongue stitching
Heritage details like a 1970s heel logo nod to its legacy

attributes.name: Air Jordan
attributes.description: Cold, wet weather usually means it's time to put away your J's until the spring.With the Air Jordan 1 Acclimate, those days are over.Part boot, part sneaker, it uses winterized materials in a toe-to-heel overhaul that's designed to help you stay warm and dry without losing the iconic AJ1 appeal.

attributes.name: WORKER 20.5" - CHINO SHORTS FOR MEN
attributes.description: Our mens Original 20 joggers are a basic staple. Featuring everything you need from the perfect pair of relaxed trousers; draw cord and elasticated waist, elasticated cuffs for comfort fit, side and back pockets with a popper fastening and Saltrock branding. With a super soft, peach fluff finished inside for warmth and comfort.

attributes.name: Nike Sportswear Tech Fleece
attributes.description: Ready for cooler weather, the Nike Sportswear Tech Fleece Joggers feature an updated fit perfect for everyday wear. Roomy through the thigh, this tapered design narrows at the knee to give you a comfortable feel without losing the clean, tailored look you love. Tall ribbed cuffs complete the jogger look while a zipped pocket on the right leg provides secure small-item storage and elevates the look.

attributes.name: NICCE Mens Original Hood
attributes.description: Original overhead hood featuring a white chest logo, with a drawstring hood, pouch pocket and cuffed sleeves and hem. A simple and easy piece, great to layer and throw on with jeans or joggers.

attributes.name: Nike Pegasus Trail 3
attributes.description: Find your wings with an off-road run. The Nike Pegasus Trail 3 has the same cushioned comfort you love, with a design that nods to the classic Pegasus look. It's got tough traction to help you stay moving through rocky terrain. More support around the midfoot helps you feel secure on your journey.

attributes.name: Men's Full-Zip Fleece Hoodie
attributes.description: Made in Milan, Italy with thoughtful consideration of every last detail, this full-zip hoodie is designed for lightweight warmth and 360 degrees of comfort. A buttery-soft blend of cotton, cashmere and elastane lies flat on your skin for a smooth feel.

attributes.name: Nike Red Hoodie
attributes.description: This Hoodie outfits you in cosy comfort that's easy to layer. It's made from soft, warm fleece with an oversized chest graphic to make it clear who you're repping.

attributes.name: Nike Metcon 7
attributes.description: The Nike Metcon 7 is the gold standard for weight training—even tougher and more stable than previous versions.We've also added React foam that ups the comfort to keep you ready for high-intensity cardio.Plus, a tab locks down your laces so you can forget about them coming untied when you're focused on your next PR.

attributes.name: Nike Air Huarache
attributes.description: Built to fit your foot and designed for comfort, the Nike Air Huarache brings back a street-level favourite. Updated with sleek colours, this version has soft, synthetic leather accents on the upper that mix with super-breathable, perfectly shined neoprene-like fabric for easy styling.

attributes.name: Women's Woven Tennis Trousers
attributes.description: Made with multiple oversized pockets, the Naomi Osaka Trousers are a wardrobe staple with plenty of storage.Signature Naomi Osaka details, like her logo on the left pocket, put a premium spin on any outfit.

attributes.name: iPhone 11
attributes.description: The iPhone 11 features an all-new dual-camera system that takes your photos to a whole new level. The Ultra Wide camera captures shots that are four times wider than any taken with previous iPhones. The new Night Mode delivers natural low-light shots – automatically. It runs with the A13 Bionic, the fastest chip in any smartphone and has an all-day battery life. It comes in six stunning new colours with a new, strengthened front and back glass.

attributes.name: Samsung Galaxy A55 5G
attributes.description: Meet the Galaxy A55 5G. The simple yet improved Galaxy A series comes in an iconic design featuring a 3-camera layout in a metal flat frame design for an easy and intuitive grip. Plus, it’s built with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+ making it tougher and more damage-resistant. The big pixel camera absorbs more light for bright, sharp, and accurate colours with low noise at night to give you awesome Nightography. Snap crisp, detailed shots with the 50MP high-resolution Wide-angle camera. Catch tiny details and dynamic colours for a new visual experience. Perfect for capturing all your share-worthy moments. The 32MP Selfie camera allows you to capture high-quality selfies with options to choose warm or natural tones. Utilize Portrait Mode to elevate your pictures, sharpening focus on the subject with precise bokeh and background blur effects. Capture the world in Super HDR with videos that shine in different lighting conditions, thanks to optimised colour and contrast. Record precise and smooth motion with OIS and VDIS stabilisation in 4K. Take advantage of the improved Octa-core processor and effortlessly multi-task, game, and stream. The 6.6-inch FHD+ Super AMOLED display provides an immersive experience. Vision Booster enhances visibility by optimising colour and contrast under the sun. Get a vivid display with 1,000 nits. And up to 120Hz adaptive refresh rate for a more responsive experience. Boundless power at your fingertips with our 5,000mAh (typical) Super Fast Charging battery. Stay connected longer, charge faster, and live life on your terms.
